we decompile the binary and using huffcode algorithm and the bin value we found and the offset we use them to extract the flag

bin : 
000010000000010011000010101001101110000010000100110000001000010000111011001100001000010011000100110000000100110001000110111010100110111010010101110111010111111110011010011011100001100101011101011111111001101011000100110001001100100010000100110010

offset :

var_16 = 0x5;
var_20 = 0x9;
var_24 = 0xc;
var_28 = 0xd;
var_32 = 0x10;
var_36 = 0x2d;
var_12 = 0x3f;

finaly we foud the flag 

msspctf{N1c3_Y0u_s0lv3d_m3_R3v3}
